inventors.name: Thomas Edison
inventors.description: Edison developed the first practical and long-lasting light bulb, transforming modern life.

inventors.name: Alexander Graham Bell
inventors.description: Bell is credited with inventing and patenting the first practical telephone.

inventors.name: Nikola Tesla
inventors.description: Tesla revolutionized electricity delivery with the development of alternating current (AC) systems.

inventors.name: Marie Curie
inventors.description: Curie conducted pioneering research on radioactivity, becoming the first woman to win a Nobel Prize.

inventors.name: Tim Berners-Lee
inventors.description: Berners-Lee invented the World Wide Web, enabling easy access and sharing of information on the Internet.
